mapper.select: SELECT outbound_id, outbound_date, stock_id, outbound_qty, ac_id, emp_id, remark, approval FROM outbound
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outbound (outbound_date, stock_id, outbound_qty, ac_id, emp_id, remark, approval) VALUES (#{outbound_date}, #{stock_id}, #{outbound_qty}, #{ac_id}, #{emp_id}, #{remark}, #{approval})
